Text: Mahtava Leffa, hyvä laatu! Kaipaan Ruotsinkielistä textitystä!! Subtitlar på svenska önskas!!!

This sounds excellent, thank you for uploiading it Jani.

I love Finnish films and have a partner who's Finnish who often misses hearing her language. Can you recommend some other excellent films that are along the lines of comedies, or along the lines of Musta Jää or Paha Maa too? We have all the Kaurismäki's on DVD already.
i have added another finnish movie: klassikko
